item.description:
Due to inclement weather, the MassLPA Christmas Party has been cancelled. We have rescheduled our Holiday Bash to January 3rd same time, same location. Merry Christmas Patriots.

Bob Dwyer
cell: 508-930-5530
MassLPA.org

Come celebrate Christmas with your fellow Patriots at the Liberty
Playhouse in Worcester on December 20th between 4:00pm - 8:00pm.
We have much too celebrate, as the Liberty movement has become a force
in the Commonwealth and across the nation.
The establishment has noticed our efforts and a shift back towards a
constitutional government has begun. Ron Paul's HR 1207 has
passed the house, the pandemic bill has been watered down and is
stalled in committee, Carla Howell has once again accomplished a
ballot initiative to reduce the size of state government and we have
many liberty candidates running for offices.
Please bring liquid refreshments, snacks or food to share if you can.


Location: 4th floor 18 Grafton St Worcester, MA
Call for more info 508-930-5530
item.name: MassLPA Christmas Party in Worcester - Rescheduled!
